forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun spills over the city, casting a golden glow on the iconic skyline as a gentle breeze muscles its way through the streets. With temperatures resting comfortably around the mid-60s, the air feels pleasantly warm yet cool enough to remind you that the sea isn't too far off. The wind, teasingly playful at 13 miles an hour, adds an element of vitality, inviting you to leave your windows open and breathe in that unique blend of salt and city life. 

Tonight, the skies will mellow into a soft, partly cloudy canvas, wrapping the day in a comforting embrace as temperatures dip to around 54 degrees. The whisper of the wind will continue, albeit softer, offering a lullaby of nature that might persuade you to take a stroll beneath the dimming sky. It’s an ideal scenario for a light sweater or a casual jacket, enhanced by the camaraderie of an evening out—perhaps an impromptu visit to a local café to savor the richness of a warm drink, as the city’s rhythm turns to a more relaxed pace. With a panorama free from the fog's usual grip, today beckons for a genuine exploration of the urban landscape; savor the sunlight while it graces the city, perhaps indulging in the understated charm of an afternoon park stroll or an outdoor art installation.
